content.body: how do i control the list of reviewers for a proposal repo?
only 4 people show up and i can't assign arbitrary github ids AFAICT
like i'm trying to assign bakkot and Michael Ficarra to https://github.com/tc39/proposal-atomics-microwait/pull/8 and i can't
content.formatted_body: like i'm trying to assign bakkot and Michael Ficarra to https://github.com/tc39/proposal-atomics-microwait/pull/8 and i can't

content.body: Go to `Settings` > `Collaborators and Teams` > `Add Teams`, and then add `@tc39/eligible-meeting-participants` and grant them the `Read` role.
content.formatted_body: Go to Settings > Collaborators and Teams > Add Teams, and then add @tc39/eligible-meeting-participants and grant them the Read role.

content.body: Or whichever team you want to grant access
